title: Privacy Policy
intro: Valorant Web Tools ("the website", "the service") respects your privacy. This document describes what data we collect and how it is used.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content:
a. Theme preference (dark / light) – stored in your browser's localStorage.
b. Language preference – stored in localStorage.
c. After you sign in via RSO:
dataCollection.storage: No email, IP, phone number, or payment data is collected.

dataStorage.title: 2. How We Store & Protect Data
dataStorage.content:
• Tokens are encrypted (AES-256 at rest) on our server.
• They are retained for 30 days since the last request, then automatically deleted.
• You may email us at any time to request immediate deletion; we will comply within 72 hours.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies & Local Storage
cookies.content: We do not set tracking cookies. Theme and language information are saved only in your own browser.
cookies.recaptcha: Google reCAPTCHA v3 is used to prevent automated abuse; Google may set its own cookies governed by Google's Privacy Policy.

dataUsage.title: 4. Purpose of Data Use
dataUsage.content:
• Display personalized statistics you explicitly requested.
• Apply your preferred theme and language automatically.
• Secure the site against bots via reCAPTCHA.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We follow industry best practices (HTTPS enforced, encryption at rest, least-privilege access) to protect the limited data stored.

loginAge.title: 6. Age Requirement
loginAge.content: Signing in through RSO indicates you meet Riot's minimum age requirements (generally 13 years). Persons under this age must not use the service.

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content:
• Google reCAPTCHA v3 (anti-bot) – see https://policies.google.com/privacy
• Riot Games Public API

userRights.title: 8. Your Rights
userRights.content: • Request deletion of all server-stored tokens and related data.
userRights.additional: • Withdraw consent by simply not logging in; stats cannot be fetched without tokens.

policyChanges.title: 9. Policy Updates
policyChanges.content: Changes to this policy will be posted on the website with an updated date.
